bcc-anticheat.title: BCC Anticheat
bcc-anticheat.description: Our AntiCheat script provides comprehensive protection against a wide range of cheats and exploits With real-time monitoring, our AntiCheat script can quickly identify and flag suspicious behavior, ensuring a safe game experience for all players.

roadmap.title: Framework support
roadmap.description: Allow for multiple frameworks, and a disable to full framework agnostic.

roadmap.title: AC Event Scrambler
roadmap.description: Scramble AC events to prevent help prevent menus

roadmap.title: Player Reporting System
roadmap.description: A system for players to report mis-conduct or cheating.

bcc-job-alerts.title: BCC Job Alerts
bcc-job-alerts.description: A job-based alert/ping system designed for RedM/Vorp servers. It comes with customizable commands that allow players to alert specific job roles such as Doctor or Police.

roadmap.title: Response Command
roadmap.description: A command (/respond) that is a reply to Job Alerts, allows the person who enacted the alert to know someone is on their way.

bcc-oil.title: BCC Oil
bcc-oil.description: A highly customizable, easy to install, feature heavy Oil job system will add plenty of content to your server!

roadmap.title: Custom Wagon Blip
roadmap.description: Add a customizable blip to your oil, and supply wagons.

roadmap.title: Oil Sniffing
roadmap.description: Add a place to sniff oil and get high.

roadmap.title: Robbery Overhaul
roadmap.description: Plan to make the robbery more customizable.

roadmap.title: Alert Police During Robberies
roadmap.description: Send an alert to the cops during robberies.

bcc-farming.title: BCC Farming
bcc-farming.description: A highly customizable farming script will handle all your farming needs!

roadmap.title: Stealing Plants
roadmap.description: Add a config option to allow players to steal other players plants.

roadmap.title: Fertilizer
roadmap.description: Add fertilizer, and when used will decrease the time it takes for the plant to grow.

roadmap.title: Refill Water Buckets At Pumps
roadmap.description: Creates a built in option to refill water buckets at pumps.

bcc-scene.title: BCC Scene
bcc-scene.description: Add custom text 'scenes' anywhere in the RedM game world. Whether you want to create immersive NPC dialogue, display important quest information, or simply add some flavor text to enhance the game world's atmosphere, bcc-scene is the perfect solution.

roadmap.title: Manage From a Distance
roadmap.description: Allow players to edit/delete scenes from a further distances. (For example, allow admin to delete scenes from anywhere)
